item.description:
Come join us for an open Imbolc celebration to welcome back the light!!

This meet up is WILL be at the UU Church in Gardner! :)

(Directions coming soon)

Meet-n-Greet and appetizers will begin from 4:30- 5:30 pm,

and pre-ritual talk will begin at 5:30.

The ritual will start promptly at 6:00 pm, so don't be late!

Doors will close at 5:30- PLEASE no late comers!! No exceptions!

We will be doing an Imbolc ritual, along with a guided meditation to go down to the Underworld to meet with the Goddess Brigid, to release that which no longer serves us in our lives...and to do some candle magick to bring about our wishes for the coming year, and to bring back the light!

After the ceremony, will be a pot luck dinner.

Donation will be $5.00 per person to pay for the church rental, paper products and ritual supplies. If there is money left over, it will go towards a Spring Fling Party with DJ at the Knights of Columbus in Gardner.

Because of the nature of the ritual, this will be for adults or kids 10+ only, souls under 16 are admitted for free :)

After the ritual anyone who would like can join us for drinks or conversation at:

The Gardner Ale House

Look for pot luck sign up sheet a week prior to the meet up! :)
item.name: Open Imbolc Celebration
